questions.question: What is a potential weakness of relying solely on passwords without MFA in credential stuffing scenarios?
choices: Attackers can gain access if passwords are reused across sites
The site needs more storage for login logs
The site becomes more susceptible to DDoS

questions.question: Why is enabling MFA critical for protecting accounts against credential stuffing?
choices: It removes the need for passwords
It ensures that stolen credentials alone are insufficient for access
